/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. A red bus can be seen in the distance, adding a pop of color to the otherwise green and blue landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective and makes the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
